name: Neptunopolis
description:
Neptunopolis is a first-person shooter in which the Player must escape the super-max prison on the Planet Neptune!

Shoot, climb and grapple your way through a linear level, taking care to deactivate the enemy turrets and discovering Audio Tapes!

To view the development of Neptunopolis, please visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL96mt8rcsyPK9lVi9KsSqtZPuUwuU3Tis

Neptunopolis can be played with either Mouse and Keyboard or Controller but please note that Menus require Mouse functionality.

Neptunopolis was created for the Games Proposal module of my univsersity course of Games Design at the University of Central Lancashire.
UCLan Games Design: https://gamescourse.co.uk/
Music: https://uppbeat.io/t/moire/laniakea/
License Code: VQSIPESMDL6BZP9J

Special thanks to Samuel Bate and Isaac Gibbins for voices provided for Audio Logs.
